entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is one of the players who are part of Harry's Quidditch team. He is mentioned as being absent from the conversation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a player and possibly the captain of his Quidditch team. He is upset because he has lost a match for the first time ever.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends and teammates. He tries to console Harry after losing the match.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is another friend and teammate of Harry's. He also tries to comfort Harry after their loss.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a teacher at Hogwarts who comes over to tell the team to leave Harry alone.

relationships.description: Harry realizes that Wood is not there, indicating his absence from the conversation.
Fred tries to console Harry after losing the match.
George also tries to comfort Harry after their loss.
Madam Pomfrey comes over to tell the team to leave Harry alone, indicating that she is trying to protect him from further distress.
